pullRequest.title: CLDR-8534 support authenticated mail
pullRequest.bodyText:
drop the CLDR_SMTP parameter, vector to existing Java params

To enable mail:

CLDR_SENDMAIL=true
mail.host (set to your host, or leave blank for 'pretend' mode)
set CLDR_SMTP_USER / CLDR_SMTP_PASSWORD for authentication
All other parameters are documented at:
https://javaee.github.io/javamail/docs/api/com/sun/mail/smtp/package-summary.html

also fixes CLDR-13156

- set CLDR_SMTP_USER / CLDR_SMTP_PASSWORD for authentication
